item.title: いらっしゃい!
item.description: I am a professor at the Conservatoire National des Arts et Métiers, holder of the Chair of design Jean Prouvé, and member of the Dicen-IDF laboratory (EA 7339). Researching My main focus is the creation of a Japanese philosophy-inspired design framework to think further the relation between design and appropriation, contributing to Transforming Practices. I am also co-organising the seminar Mediums in design with Annie Gentès, CY École de design.
